comments:
I changed the HTML editor key bindings so that CTRL-SHIFT-F would be Format Active Element instead of Format Document. Everything seemed to work but in the process, a few of the following exceptions got written to the log.

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: All triggers in a trigger sequence must be an instance of Trigger
